headline.print_headline: Scientists Look Into Why Most Alzheimer's Patients Are Women
headline.main: Scientists Look Into Why Most Alzheimer's Patients Are Women

docs.lead_paragraph: Nearly two-thirds of Americans with Alzheimer's disease are women, and now some scientists are questioning the long-held assumption that it's just because they tend to live longer than men.
docs.snippet: Nearly two-thirds of Americans with Alzheimer's disease are women, and now some scientists are questioning the long-held assumption that it's just because they tend to live longer than men.
